localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.
blogPost.body: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.
blogPost.title: Trackingplan - Monitor your analytics without the hassle
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 获取您所有分析的动态快照。只需复制并粘贴一行代码到您的网站或应用程序中，在几分钟内，您的所有活动将被监控并自动添加到您的跟踪计划中。
localize.tagline: 轻松监控您的分析结果

localize.description: 獲取您所有分析的動態快照。只需複製並粘貼一行代碼到您的網站或應用程序中，在幾分鐘內，您的所有活動將被監控並自動添加到您的跟蹤計劃中。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆監控您的分析結果

previous.excerpt: Amigos is a hand-drawn illustration library excellent for creating infinite compositions! Be one of the first to test out these doodles exclusively with Blush Pro.
previous.title: Amigos - Customizable illustrations for any project

localize.description: Amigos是一个手绘插画库，非常适合创作无限的作品! 成为第一批试用这些Blush Pro专属涂鸦的人。
localize.tagline: 可为任何项目定制插图

localize.description: Amigos是一個手繪插畫庫，非常適合創作無限的作品! 成爲第一批試用這些Blush Pro專屬塗鴉的人。
localize.tagline: 可爲任何項目定製插圖

next.excerpt: Fintoc enables developers to initiate bank transfers and pull transactional data from their users' bank accounts. Whether an app wants to automate bank reconciliation or improve its underwriting process, Fintoc is the way to go in Latin America.
next.title: Fintoc - An API to connect bank accounts with any app in LATAM

localize.description: Fintoc使开发人员能够启动银行转账，并从用户的银行账户中提取交易数据。无论一款应用是想自动进行银行对账还是改善其核销流程，Fintoc都是拉美地区的最佳选择。
localize.tagline: 一个连接银行账户与拉美地区任何应用程序的API。

localize.description: Fintoc使開發人員能夠啓動銀行轉賬，並從用戶的銀行賬戶中提取交易數據。無論一款應用是想自動進行銀行對賬還是改善其核銷流程，Fintoc都是拉美地區的最佳選擇。
localize.tagline: 一個連接銀行賬戶與拉美地區任何應用程序的API。
